mapper.insert: insert into t_i18n (I18N_KEY, I18N_LANG, DOMAIN_TYPE, I18N_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_BY) values (#{i18nKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i18nLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i18nContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
